column5: I just wanted to introduce myself as I have been reading your posts for a while now.  I am impressed with the knowledge that everyone openly shares and your friendship for each other.  Those are the two main reasons I am posting... and I don't want to work on my report cards.  I am a Grade 8 teacher from Chatham who usually fishes from shore for perch and crappie  in Lake Erie.  I also always work fishing into the vacation when I go to Myrtle Beach, the Florida Keys or Manitoulin Island.  This summer I think we are going out east for a few weeks. Thanks in advance for all the help as I am looking for a boat and I am certain to have questions over the next few weeks about that and other matters. Matt C.
Welcome to the family.  I'm sure you will enjoy your time here.
Welcome Matt C! Always nice to meet someone else from the "field".
You got my attention! Welcome to the board and enjoy your time here.
Welcome Matt, I'm sure that you will like it around here..
Welcome to the board Matt. Great place to swap stories and Info as you must already know!
Welcome
Welcome to the board Matt! Ask lots of boat questions....  :-)
welcome to the board
welcome aboard looking forward to ur reports from ur vacations
Welcome to the board Matt look forward to your reports  Rob
hey did anyone ever want to give a teacher a DETENTION ?  WELL HERE IS YOUR CHANCE !  Welcome to the board anyways... teach !  lol
EH!  Welcome aboard the board  !!!
Welcome Matt
"I am a Grade 8 teacher from Chatham"  toughest job ever  ..  welcome aboard.
Welcome!

Thanks everyone for the warm welcome.  I feel like I am in detention right now marking Math tests and working on my report cards.  Don't get me wrong... I love my students and my job... I'll probably have boat questions tomorrow as I am going to be calling around to some places. Thanks again.... ...Matt C.
Welcome aboard!
welcome, glad you joined,  im sure you will love it.  i am  also a teacher grades 9-12 vocational agriculture in southern ohio.  jason

Welcome Matt!  You will find what you are looking for here.  Ahh, report cards.  I remember what mine used to look like in grade 8:  History: Math: English: Art: Science:  No wonder I never wanted to show my parents!
Welcome Matt
Welcome aboard Matt.  I always did well in skool. A few bucks will go a long way. A coupla pics of the skool director dressing a sheep in a nightgown don't hurt either.
Welcome.
